channel.title: Setting Enviomential Variables
channel.description:
Ok to start off your going to need to have Java and Jdk Installed. Step 1 Java:[url=http://www.java.com/en/]http://www.java.com/en/[/url] JDK: [url=https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jdk-6u24-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer]https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jdk-6u24-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer[/url]
[size=10pt]DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE x64 BIT ONLY THE 32 BIT (doesn't matter what type of computer you have)[/size]
Step 2 After you downloaded jdk x32 bit, and normal java you going to open up your Environmental Variables To do this go to computer and right click on properties.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/ip3444.png[/img]
Step 3
Once your here you're going to go to Advanced System Settings
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2hrcwuo.png[/img]
Step 4
Then click on Environmental Variables
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2cp2gc0.png[/img]
Step 5
This is what should show. There are 2 boxes the Top Box and the Bottom box. You will Click New for the TOP box.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/29ux4jn.png[/img]
You should get something like this. [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2ex4lxz.png[/img]
In that box at the TOP for the Variable Name type path
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/ofshty.png[/img]
[Note] There might be more than one path in the top and bottom so just keep them and make a new one
Step 6
Now in the bottom part of the New Variable copy and paste: [code]C:\Program Files(x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;[/code]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/5exzma.png[/img]
[NOTE] If your java saves in program files (x86) you do not need to change that. if it is not located there then delete the (x86) part and CHANGE YOUR JAVA VERSION
EXAMPLE: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/530fmt.png[/img]
If Your java is not installed in the (x86) folder, use this code instead for that bottom part of path
[code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;[/code]
[NOTE] MUST CHANGE YOUR JAVA VERSION TO YOUR CURRENT VERSION!
Step 7
Now click NEW again at the TOP box.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/29ux4jn.png[/img]
Step 8
On the TOP part of the box type classpath.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/b9ajqq.png[/img]
Step 9
On the bottom box copy and pate code: [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/n1xky1.png[/img]
[NOTE] That code is for people where there java is located in the (x86) folder, and that has the jdk and java update 24 change if its not your java version!
When your done it should look like this:
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2rndfg8.png[/img]
Step 10
[size=10pt]EVERYTHING FROM HERE AND DOWN IS EDITING THE BOTTOM BOX PART[/size]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/vglg1g.png[/img]
Click NEW.
Step 11 type in the top part of the box path
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/ofshty.png[/img]
Step 12 The BOTTOM part of the box copy and paste: [code]C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\DivX Shared\;C:\Program Files (x86)\QuickTime\QTSystem\[/code]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2aguirk.png[/img]
[NOTE] If java is not located in PROGRAM FILES (x86) then take out the (x86). ALSO change to your Java version!
EXAMPLE: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/530fmt.png[/img]
Step 13 Now Create a NEW Varible again.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/29ux4jn.png[/img]
Step 14 The TOP part of the new box type classpath.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/b9ajqq.png[/img]
Step 15 The BOTTOM part of the box copy and paste: [code].;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip[/code]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/209nfo4.png[/img]
[NOTE] If java is not located in PROGRAM FILES (x86) then take out the (x86). ALSO change to your Java version!
EXAMPLE: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/530fmt.png[/img]
Step 16
Once you click ok your set!
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/i70jkn.png[/img]
CLICK OK, DO NOT EXIT CLICK OK, DO NOT EXIT CLICK OK, DO NOT EXIT CLICK OK, DO NOT EXIT CLICK OK, DO NOT EXIT CLICK OK, DO NOT EXIT
made by weed4u

item.title: Setting Enviomential Variables
item.dc:creator: @weed4u weed4u
item.description:
@weed4u wrote:

Ok to start off your going to need to have Java and Jdk Installed.
Step 1
Java:http://www.java.com/en/
JDK: https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jdk-6u24-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer

[size=10pt]DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE x64 BIT ONLY THE 32 BIT (doesn’t matter what type of computer you have)[/size]

Step 2
After you downloaded jdk x32 bit, and normal java you going to open up your Environmental Variables
To do this go to computer and right click on properties.

Step 3

Once your here you’re going to go to Advanced System Settings

Step 4

Then click on Environmental Variables

Step 5

This is what should show. There are 2 boxes the Top Box and the Bottom box.
You will Click New for the TOP box.

You should get something like this.

In that box at the TOP for the Variable Name type path

[Note] There might be more than one path in the top and bottom so just keep them and make a new one

Step 6

Now in the bottom part of the New Variable copy and paste:

C:\Program Files(x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;

[NOTE] If your java saves in program files (x86) you do not need to change that. if it is not located there then delete the (x86) part and CHANGE YOUR JAVA VERSION

EXAMPLE:

530fmt.png845×514

If Your java is not installed in the (x86) folder, use this code instead for that bottom part of path

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;

[NOTE] MUST CHANGE YOUR JAVA VERSION TO YOUR CURRENT VERSION!

Step 7

Now click NEW again at the TOP box.

Step 8

On the TOP part of the box type classpath.

Step 9

On the bottom box copy and pate code:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

[NOTE] That code is for people where there java is located in the (x86) folder, and that has the jdk and java update 24 change if its not your java version!

When your done it should look like this:

Step 10

[size=10pt]EVERYTHING FROM HERE AND DOWN IS EDITING THE BOTTOM BOX PART[/size]

Click NEW.

Step 11
type in the top part of the box path

Step 12
The BOTTOM part of the box copy and paste:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\DivX Shared\;C:\Program Files (x86)\QuickTime\QTSystem\

[NOTE] If java is not located in PROGRAM FILES (x86) then take out the (x86). ALSO change to your Java version!

EXAMPLE:

530fmt.png845×514

Step 13
Now Create a NEW Varible again.

Step 14
The TOP part of the new box type classpath.

Step 15
The BOTTOM part of the box copy and paste:

.;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

[NOTE] If java is not located in PROGRAM FILES (x86) then take out the (x86). ALSO change to your Java version!

EXAMPLE:

530fmt.png845×514

Step 16

Once you click ok your set!

CLICK OK, DO NOT EXIT
CLICK OK, DO NOT EXIT
CLICK OK, DO NOT EXIT
CLICK OK, DO NOT EXIT
CLICK OK, DO NOT EXIT
CLICK OK, DO NOT EXIT

made by weed4u
